member.name: M:Parbad.Builder.MemoryCacheStorageBuilderExtensions.UseMemoryCache(Parbad.Storage.Abstractions.IStorageBuilder)
member.summary:
Uses for saving and loading data.
Note: The information inside the memory will be removed if the website or server goes down for any reasons. Use MemoryCache only for development.
